text: Recent developments, future objectives and challenges Termination of the arm share purchase agreement on february 8, 2022, nvidia and softbank announced the termination of the share purchase agreement whereby nvidia would have acquired arm from softbank. the parties agreed to terminate because of significant regulatory challenges preventing the completion of the transaction. we intend to record in operating expenses a $1.36 billion charge in the first quarter of fiscal year 2023 reflecting the write-off of the prepayment provided at signing in september 2020.
